game.name: All Queens Chess
game.board: The game is played on 5-row, 5-column chessboard.
game.pieces: The first player has six white queens. The second player has six black queens. The queens are arranged as follows at the start of the game.[img src="allqueenschess.svg" alt="aqc" width="500" height="500"]
game.tomove:
Move one of your queens as you would in chess, except that you may not capture pieces. Be the first to arrange four or five of your queens in a vertical, horizontal, or diagonal line.
Andrew Esteban (Backend, Solving) Cameron Cheung (GamesmanUni GUI)
